meanings.definition: Presenting a joke or humorous statement in a deliberately impassive or expressionless manner.
meanings.sent1: Her deadpanning delivery of the punchline made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's deadpanning style added a unique touch to his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent3: Even though she was deadpanning, her wit shone through in the joke.
meanings.sent4: His deadpanning demeanor masked the hilarity of his words.
meanings.sent5: The deadpanning performance left the audience in stitches.

meanings.definition: To deliver a line or performance with a lack of emotion or reaction.
meanings.sent1: He was deadpanning his lines throughout the entire play.
meanings.sent2: She deadpanned the news report, making it hard to discern her true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The actor's deadpanning of the tragic scene had the audience in fits of laughter.
meanings.sent4: In the intense moment, he was deadpanning his lines as if nothing mattered.
meanings.sent5: The detective deadpanning his findings added an air of mystery to the investigation.
